REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f7825 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-18 0083

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN 15 MLN STG AFTERNOON HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it had provided the money market with a further 15 mln stg assistance. This brings the Bank's total help so far today to 344 mln stg and compares with the estimated shortage of around 1.3 billion stg. The central bank purchased bank bills outright, at the lower dealing rates established this morning, comprising one mln stg in band one at 9-7/8 pct and 14 mln stg in band two at 9-13/16 pct. REUTER
